description: Retrieves a list of Dev Environments in a project.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Information about filters to apply to narrow the results returned in the list. (dict) --- Information about a filter used to limit results of a query. A key that can be used to sort results. The values of the key. (string) --- comparisonOperator (string) --- The operator used to compare the fields.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: A key that can be used to sort results.

nested_params.name: comparisonOperator
nested_params.description: The operator used to compare the fields.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: Information about the Dev Environments in a project.

nested_items.name: spaceName
nested_items.description: The name of the space.

nested_items.name: projectName
nested_items.description: The name of the project in the space.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID for the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The time when the Dev Environment was last updated, in coordinated universal time (UTC) timestamp format as specified in RFC 3339.

nested_items.name: creatorId
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID of the user who created the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the status.

nested_items.name: repositories
nested_items.description: Information about the repositories that will be cloned into the Dev Environment. If no rvalue is specified, no repository is cloned.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the source repository.

nested_items.name: branchName
nested_items.description: The name of the branch in a source repository cloned into the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: alias
nested_items.description: The user-specified alias for the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: ides
nested_items.description: Information about the integrated development environment (IDE) configured for a Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: runtime
nested_items.description: A link to the IDE runtime image.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the IDE.

nested_items.name: instanceType
nested_items.description: The Amazon EC2 instace type used for the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: inactivityTimeoutMinutes
nested_items.description: The amount of time the Dev Environment will run without any activity detected before stopping, in minutes. Dev Environments consume compute minutes when running.

nested_items.name: persistentStorage
nested_items.description: Information about the configuration of persistent storage for the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: sizeInGiB
nested_items.description: The size of the persistent storage in gigabytes (specifically GiB).

nested_items.name: vpcConnectionName
nested_items.description: The name of the connection used to connect to Amazon VPC used when the Dev Environment was created, if any.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token returned from a call to this API to indicate the next batch of results to return, if any.
